Package a3

Class GhostAvatar

java.lang.Object
tage.GameObject
a3.GhostAvatar
public class GhostAvatar extends GameObject
Represents a ghost avatar in the game world, which is a visual representation of another player's avatar.

A GhostAvatar is a subclass of GameObject and includes a unique identifier (UUID) to distinguish between different players in a multiplayer session. It holds information about its shape, optional texture, and 3D position.

  • Constructor Details

    • GhostAvatar

      public GhostAvatar(UUID id, ObjShape s, TextureImage t, org.joml.Vector3f p)
      Constructs a new GhostAvatar.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier for this ghost avatar (usually the remote client's UUID).
      s - The shape of the avatar.
      t - The texture image to apply (can be null if using color).
      p - The initial 3D position of the avatar in the world.
